kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Vertical Position
kw.doc: Returns the vertical position of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Horizontal Position
kw.doc: Returns the horizontal position of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Convert To Integer
kw.doc: Converts the given item to an integer number.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Vertical Position
kw.doc: Returns the vertical position of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Horizontal Position
kw.doc: Returns the horizontal position of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
